attributes.action: Build a statue of Nina Boyle somewhere in Westminster, preferably Parliament Sq.
attributes.background: Nina Boyle was the first female MP candidate. On top of that she was a police officer, suffragette, writer, campaigner for women and a supporter of a better world. She deserves to be known.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the granting of planning permission in Parliament Square is a matter for Westminster City Council and not the UK Government or Parliament.
